Action.author: wseliga
Action.body: a comment viewable only by jira-users

ChangeItem.newstring: This issue is duplicated by TST-1
This issue is duplicated by TST-3
This issue is duplicated by TST-2

Component.name: Component A
Component.description: this is some description of component A

EventType.name: Work Logged On Issue
EventType.description: This is the 'work logged on issue' event.

EventType.name: Work Started On Issue
EventType.description: This is the 'work started on issue' event.

EventType.name: Work Stopped On Issue
EventType.description: This is the 'work stopped on issue' event.

EventType.name: Issue Comment Edited
EventType.description: This is the 'issue comment edited' event.

EventType.name: Issue Worklog Updated
EventType.description: This is the 'issue worklog updated' event.

EventType.name: Issue Worklog Deleted
EventType.description: This is the 'issue worklog deleted' event.

FieldConfigScheme.name: Default Issue Type Scheme
FieldConfigScheme.description: Default issue type scheme is the list of global issue types. All newly created issue types will automatically be added to this scheme.

FieldConfigScheme.name: Default Configuration Scheme for My Number Field
FieldConfigScheme.description: Default configuration scheme generated by JIRA

FieldConfigScheme.name: Default Configuration Scheme for My Radio buttons
FieldConfigScheme.description: Default configuration scheme generated by JIRA

FieldConfigScheme.name: Default Configuration Scheme for project
FieldConfigScheme.description: Default configuration scheme generated by JIRA

FieldConfigScheme.name: Default Configuration Scheme for project
FieldConfigScheme.description: Default configuration scheme generated by JIRA

FieldConfiguration.name: Default Configuration for My Number Field
Default Configuration for My Radio buttons

FieldLayoutItem.description: For example operating system, software platform and/or hardware specifications (include as appropriate for the issue).

An estimate of how much work remains until this issue will be resolved.
The format of this is ' *w *d *h *m ' (representing weeks, days, hours and minutes - where * can be any number)
Examples: 4d, 5h 30m, 60m and 3w.
Allows work to be logged whilst creating, editing or transitioning issues.

FieldScreen.name: Default Screen
FieldScreen.description: Allows to update all system fields.

FieldScreen.name: Workflow Screen
FieldScreen.description: This screen is used in the workflow and enables you to assign issues

FieldScreen.name: Resolve Issue Screen
FieldScreen.description: Allows to set resolution, change fix versions and assign an issue.

Issue.summary: A task where someone will vote

IssueType.name: Bug
IssueType.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

IssueType.name: New Feature
IssueType.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.

IssueType.name: Task
IssueType.description: A task that needs to be done.

IssueType.name: Improvement
IssueType.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

IssueTypeScreenScheme.name: Default Issue Type Screen Scheme
IssueTypeScreenScheme.description: The default issue type screen scheme

OSPropertyString.value: For example operating system, software platform and/or hardware specifications (include as appropriate for the issue).

An estimate of how much work remains until this issue will be resolved.
The format of this is ' *w *d *h *m ' (representing weeks, days, hours and minutes - where * can be any number)
Examples: 4d, 5h 30m, 60m and 3w.
This value can not be changed after work has begun on the issue.
A User with / in its username

PermissionScheme.name: Default Permission Scheme
PermissionScheme.description: This is the default Permission Scheme. Any new projects that are created will be assigned this scheme.

PermissionScheme.name: Anonymous Permission Scheme
PermissionScheme.description: This is the default Permission Scheme modified slightly so that anonymous users can browse project.

PermissionScheme.name: Anonymous Permission Scheme - With Edit Allowed
PermissionScheme.description: This is the default Permission Scheme modified slightly so that anonymous users can browse project and do some modifications.

PluginVersion.name: JIRA Shared Application Access Layer (SAL) Plugin
Atlassian Gadgets OAuth Service Provider Plugin
JIRA OAuth Service Provider SPI Plugin
ROME: RSS/Atom syndication and publishing tools
ROME, RSS and atOM utilitiEs for Java

Priority.name: Blocker
Priority.description: Blocks development and/or testing work, production could not run.

Priority.name: Critical
Priority.description: Crashes, loss of data, severe memory leak.

Priority.name: Minor
Priority.description: Minor loss of function, or other problem where easy workaround is present.

Priority.name: Trivial
Priority.description: Cosmetic problem like misspelt words or misaligned text.

Project.name: Restricted Project
Project.description: This project is visible only by Administrator

ProjectCategory.name: Category A
ProjectCategory.description: This is a description of category A

ProjectRole.name: Users
ProjectRole.description: A project role that represents users in a project

ProjectRole.name: Developers
ProjectRole.description: A project role that represents developers in a project

ProjectRole.name: Administrators
ProjectRole.description: A project role that represents administrators in a project

Resolution.name: Fixed
Resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

Resolution.name: Won't Fix
Resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.

Resolution.name: Duplicate
Resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

Resolution.name: Incomplete
Resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.

Resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce
Resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

Status.name: Open
Status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

Status.name: In Progress
Status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.

Status.name: Reopened
Status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

Status.name: Resolved
Status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Status.name: Closed
Status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Workflow.name: test-workflow
Workflow.descriptor: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE workflow PUBLIC "-//OpenSymphony Group//DTD OSWorkflow 2.8//EN" "http://www.opensymphony.com/osworkflow/workflow_2_8.dtd"> <workflow> <meta name="jira.update.author.name">admin</meta> <meta name="jira.description">The default JIRA workflow.</meta> <meta name="jira.updated.date">1285000437024</meta> <initial-actions> <action id="1" name="Create Issue"> <meta name="opsbar-sequence">0</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.title">common.forms.create</meta> <validators> <validator name="" type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.validator.PermissionValidator</arg> <arg name="permission">Create Issue</arg> </validator> </validators> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Finished" status="Open" step="1"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueCreateFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> <arg name="eventTypeId">1</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </initial-actions> <common-actions> <action id="2" name="Close Issue" view="resolveissue"> <meta name="opsbar-sequence">60</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.submit">closeissue.close</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.description">closeissue.desc</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.title">closeissue.title</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions type="AND"> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">Resolve Issue</arg> </condition> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">Close Issue</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Finished" status="Closed" step="6"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> <arg name="eventTypeId">5</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> <action id="3" name="Reopen Issue" view="commentassign"> <meta name="opsbar-sequence">80</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.submit">issue.operations.reopen.issue</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.description">issue.operations.reopen.description</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.title">issue.operations.reopen.issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">Resolve Issue</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Finished" status="Reopened" step="5"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueFieldFunction</arg> <arg name="field.value"></arg> <arg name="field.name">resolution</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> <arg name="eventTypeId">7</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> <action id="4" name="Start Progress"> <meta name="opsbar-sequence">20</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.title">startprogress.title</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.AllowOnlyAssignee</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Finished" status="Underway" step="3"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueFieldFunction</arg> <arg name="field.value"></arg> <arg <action id="5" name="Resolve Issue" view="resolveissue"> <meta name="opsbar-sequence">40</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.submit">resolveissue.resolve</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.description">resolveissue.desc.line1</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.title">resolveissue.title</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">Resolve Issue</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Finished" status="Resolved" step="4"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> </common-actions> <steps> <step id="1" name="Open"> <meta name="jira.status.id">1</meta> <actions> <common-action id="4" /> <common-action id="5" /> <common-action id="2" /> <action id="711" name="Estimate" view="fieldscreen"> <meta name="jira.description">Provide some estimation</meta> <meta name="jira.fieldscreen.id">10000</meta> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="1"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> </actions> </step> <step id="3" name="In Progress"> <meta name="jira.status.id">3</meta> <actions> <common-action id="5" /> <common-action id="2" /> <action id="301" name="Stop Progress"> <meta name="opsbar-sequence">20</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.title">stopprogress.title</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.AllowOnlyAssignee</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Finished" status="Assigned" name="opsbar-sequence">60</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.submit">closeissue.close</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.description">closeissue.desc</meta> <meta name="jira.i18n.title">closeissue.title</meta> <meta name="jira.description">Closing an issue indicates there is no more work to be done on it, and it has been verified as complete.</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg Worklog.body: a worklog viewable just by jira-users
